page.title: 05Employment in Insch.
page.content: One of the largest employers, G.& R. Youngs have thirty eight workers, and they help farmers with ploughing and even demolition work.Insch Plant Hire, with twenty six,perform a similar task. H.R.N.also employ twenty six in selling and servicing farm machinery. For delivery of feed and fertiliser then the haulage firm W.E Penny, employing seventeen people will be of service.They also hire out floats, diggers and forklift trucks.Harbro serves the farmers by providing them with feed for animals but most of their employees are based at Turriff. Aberdeen and Northern Marts Ltd. have a mart in Insch and Monday sees the local farmers in attendance for the weekly live_stock sale. Usually twenty employees are required to help with the movement of beasts through the mart.
